column1: NB (!!): The overlap fraction is the fraction of events which overlap between the shallow and deep detectors when they are deployed at a ratio of 1:1.9
This is reasonably close to the 1:2.17 ratio in the review array

column2: to get the total array effective volume

column1: But you should not trust that formula for n_deep == n_shallow
column2: because that is NOT what was simulated. It needs to be ~1:2
